ISSUE.TITLE: rawhide: parallel build flake is back
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Seen twice in CI in the past month, and once [in gating](https://artifacts.dev.testing-farm.io/9f4c95ac-97b5-42a7-89c2-74c5801565c8/work-tests.yml3ly3uno9/tests-ez3228fq/test.podman-rootless.bats.log): ``` not ok 216 [070] podman parallel build should not race ... # Error: i02: image not known ``` Hypothesis: this _may_ be a different manifestation of #21504, the rawhide hang. Unfortunately it is currently impossible to debug, because `build` output is devnulled. I will look into a way to instrument the test. * rawhide : sys podman rawhide rootless host sqlite * [02-09 16:43](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/task/6641158592397312/logs/main.log#t--00216) in [sys] [070] podman parallel build should not race * [01-27 20:58](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/task/6038924317949952/logs/main.log#t--00215) in [sys] [070] podman parallel build should not race | x | x | x | x | x | x | | ---: | ---: | ---: | ---: | ---: | ---: | | sys(2) | podman(2) | rawhide(2) | rootless(2) | host(2) | sqlite(2) |

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #21743 from lsm5/packit-downstream [skip-ci] Packit: Update downstream task targets

COMMIT.MESSAGE: System tests: enable debugging for parallel-rm test There's currently no way to inspect failures of the parallel-remove test (#21742). Add debugging ability. Also, clean up nasty red warnings Signed-off-by: Ed Santiago <santiago@redhat.com>
